edu.nyu.cs.cs101.consumers

Class IntelligentBall

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.nyu.cs.cs101.consumers.GeometricObject
      • edu.nyu.cs.cs101.consumers.Ball
        • edu.nyu.cs.cs101.consumers.ExpandableBall
          • edu.nyu.cs.cs101.consumers.IntelligentBall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Colorable, Drawable, Expandable, Movable

    public class IntelligentBall
extends ExpandableBall
    An intelligent ball is a Ball that:
    1. Tries to accelerate towards smaller balls that are near it (to consume them)
    2. Tries to accelerate away from larger balls that are near it (to evade them)
    TODO: All Intelligent balls should be blue by default TODO: Write this entire class.
